medi:segment.name: Beginning of message
medi:segment.medi:documentation: BGM, A segment indicating the beginning of a message and identifying the consignment for which status is being reported.

medi:segment.name: Date/time/period
medi:segment.medi:documentation: DTM, A segment indicating the date of the message.

medi:segment.name: Transport service requirements
medi:segment.medi:documentation: TSR, A segment identifying the transport service relating to the consignment.

medi:segmentGroup.medi:documentation: Segment group 1: A group of segments to specify a party and its associated contacts with communication numbers.

medi:segment.name: Name and address
medi:segment.medi:documentation: NAD, A segment identifying a party to the consignment such as shipper or consignee.

medi:segmentGroup.medi:documentation: Segment group 2: A group of segments to identify a contact and its communications related to the party.

medi:segment.name: Contact information
medi:segment.medi:documentation: CTA, A segment to specify a contact name associated with the party.

medi:segment.name: Communication contact
medi:segment.medi:documentation: COM, A segment to specify a communication number related to the contact.

medi:segmentGroup.medi:documentation: Segment group 3: To relate a date/time to a reference, such as date of shipment reference number.

medi:segment.name: Reference
medi:segment.medi:documentation: RFF, A segment identifying a reference which applies to the entire consignment.

medi:segment.name: Date/time/period
medi:segment.medi:documentation: DTM, To relate a date/time to a reference, such as date of shipment reference number.

medi:segment.name: Place/location identification
medi:segment.medi:documentation: LOC, A segment identifying a place/location which applies to the consignment such as consignment origin and destination.

medi:segment.name: Free text
medi:segment.medi:documentation: FTX, A segment specifying free form or processable supplementary or other information.

medi:segment.name: Control total
medi:segment.medi:documentation: CNT, A segment specifying a total for the consignment.

medi:segmentGroup.medi:documentation: Segment group 4: A group of segments to identify a consignment and status details relating to it.

medi:segment.name: Consignment information
medi:segment.medi:documentation: CNI, A segment to identify a consignment for which status details are given.

medi:segment.name: Place/location identification
medi:segment.medi:documentation: LOC, A segment to indicate a location relating to the consignment, such as place/port of origin, place/port of destination.

medi:segment.name: Control total
medi:segment.medi:documentation: CNT, A segment to provide a control total for the consignment, such as total number of pieces, total weight.

medi:segmentGroup.medi:documentation: Segment group 5: SG9 A group of segments indicating the status and/or identifying an event and specifying relevant details.

medi:segment.name: Status
medi:segment.medi:documentation: STS, A segment specifying the status relating to a consignment (e.g. loaded).

medi:segment.name: Reference
medi:segment.medi:documentation: RFF, A segment identifying a reference relating to the status (e.g House Bill of Lading number).

medi:segment.name: Date/time/period
medi:segment.medi:documentation: DTM, A segment indicating the date and time of the status or event.

medi:segment.name: Document/message details
medi:segment.medi:documentation: DOC, A segment to specify document details related to the status code, such as indication which document is missing (status code: document missing).

medi:segment.name: Free text
medi:segment.medi:documentation: FTX, A segment specifying processable information relating to the status.

medi:segment.name: Name and address
medi:segment.medi:documentation: NAD, A segment specifying the name and/or address associated with the event such as notify party, terminal address, trucking company for gate move.

medi:segment.name: Place/location identification
medi:segment.medi:documentation: LOC, A segment identifying the location at which the status or event occurs.

medi:segment.name: Package identification
medi:segment.medi:documentation: PCI, A segment to specify individual packages (transportable units) relating to the consignment status.

medi:segmentGroup.medi:documentation: Segment group 6: A group of segments indicating conveyance details related to the status or event.

medi:segment.name: Details of transport
medi:segment.medi:documentation: TDT, A segment identifying conveyance related to the status or event such as flight, vessel/voyage.

medi:segment.name: Reference
medi:segment.medi:documentation: RFF, A segment specifying an additional reference related to the conveyance such as transfer manifest number, truck license number.

medi:segment.name: Place/location identification
medi:segment.medi:documentation: LOC, A segment indicating locations related to conveyance such as flight origin/destination.

medi:segment.name: Date/time/period
medi:segment.medi:documentation: DTM, A segment indicating dates related to conveyance such as destination and/or arrival date/time.

medi:segmentGroup.medi:documentation: Segment group 7: A group of segments indicating the equipment details relating to the status or event.

medi:segment.name: Equipment details
medi:segment.medi:documentation: EQD, A segment identifying equipment related to status or event such as a container of a multi-container consignment.

medi:segment.name: Measurements
medi:segment.medi:documentation: MEA, A segment specifying measurements related to the equipment such as gross weight, tare weight, capacity.

medi:segment.name: Dimensions
medi:segment.medi:documentation: DIM, A segment specifying the dimensions of the equipment such as height.

medi:segment.name: Seal number
medi:segment.medi:documentation: SEL, A segment identifying seal and seal issuer associated with the equipment.

medi:segment.name: Transport placement
medi:segment.medi:documentation: TPL, A segment to identify the means of transport to which the equipment is linked, necessary in cases where this forms the key to retrieve relevant information.

medi:segmentGroup.medi:documentation: Segment group 8: A group of segments specifying the attached equipment and the associated seal information.

medi:segment.name: Attached equipment
medi:segment.medi:documentation: EQA, A segment identifying attached equipment or related equipment such as a chassis attached to a container.

medi:segment.name: Seal number
medi:segment.medi:documentation: SEL, A segment identifying seal and seal issuer associated with the equipment.

medi:segmentGroup.medi:documentation: Segment group 9: A group of segments describing the goods item related to the status or event.

medi:segment.name: Goods item details
medi:segment.medi:documentation: GID, A segment identifying a goods item.

medi:segment.name: Handling instructions
medi:segment.medi:documentation: HAN, A segment identifying handling instructions.

medi:segment.name: Split goods placement
medi:segment.medi:documentation: SGP, A segment to identify equipment in which (part of) a goods item is transported.

medi:segment.name: Dangerous goods
medi:segment.medi:documentation: DGS, A segment to specify dangerous goods details related to the goods item.

medi:segment.name: Free text
medi:segment.medi:documentation: FTX, A segment to describe the goods item, and to provide additional free text information related to the goods item.

medi:segmentGroup.medi:documentation: Segment group 10: A group of segments specifying measurements.

medi:segment.name: Measurements
medi:segment.medi:documentation: MEA, A segment specifying measurements, other than dimension, of a goods item.

medi:segment.name: Number of units
medi:segment.medi:documentation: EQN, A segment specifying the number of units to which the given measurement is applicable.

medi:segmentGroup.medi:documentation: Segment group 11: A group of segments specifying dimensions of a goods item.

medi:segment.name: Dimensions
medi:segment.medi:documentation: DIM, A segment specifying dimensions of a goods item.

medi:segment.name: Number of units
medi:segment.medi:documentation: EQN, A segment specifying the number of units to which the given dimension is applicable.

medi:segmentGroup.medi:documentation: Segment group 12: A group of segments specifying marks and numbers related to the transport line items.

medi:segment.name: Package identification
medi:segment.medi:documentation: PCI, A segment specifying marks related to the transport line items.

medi:segment.name: Goods identity number
medi:segment.medi:documentation: GIN, A segment specifying identity numbers related to the transport line items.
